attributes.action: Make all schools offer live online lessons for all students until reopening
attributes.additional_details: Set a national requirement for all schools to offer daily live online learning
attributes.background: All schools to offer live online lessons to students to provide proper guidance, tuition and feedback on learning and work until schools reopen.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition, schools in England have been allowed to re-open and have since closed for the summer holidays. It is therefore not clear what you'd like to happen next and under which conditions.

Given your concern about schools re-opening, you may wish to sign these petitions:

Delay opening of schools until Test Track and Trace for Covid 19 is working: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320891

Keep schools closed in the UK until an effective Cov-19 vaccine is available: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319292
